import defusedxml.ElementTree as ET

def parse_xml(xml_string):
    '''
    Parse xml_string and return the root element of the XML document
    '''
    # Use ElementTree from defusedxml to parse the XML string
    # The fromstring function parses a string containing XML data
    # and returns an Element, the root element of the parsed tree
    root = ET.fromstring(xml_string)
    
    # Return the root element
    return root
